selection_reasoning: We are entering the final generation. Trial 9_2 is now the benchmark. The strategy for the final generation will be a multi-stage approach: aggressive topology exploration using circle swaps, followed by a cooling phase, and concluding with an ultra-high-precision local polish using SLSQP and Linear Programming for optimal radii assignment.
